attributes.action: make available details of MP's expense accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would personally like to see exactly what MP's are claiming for. It is the public's money they are getting, so I think we should be able to see what level of expenses some of the MP's are claiming for.
It's not like they having anything to hide, or have they?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
